name: WP FixTag
author: 3eO

sections.description:
Automatically add tags to posts . tags can be define by admin/or you can just let it extract tags from post content and add them to post . this plugin do this operations automatically when you publish a new post or edit old posts
Please feel free to offer any feature suggestions you might have and I will consider them for future releases.
sections.installation:
Take the easy route and install through the WordPress plugin adder OR :

  1. Download the .zip file and upload the unzipped folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. WP-FixTag should automatically be added to your site and WordPress.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Take the easy route and install through the WordPress plugin adder OR :

  1. Download the .zip file and upload the unzipped folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. WP-FixTag should automatically be added to your site and WordPress.

Does this work?

Yes.

What if I have more questions?

Please send me an e-mail!
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • we just started banging our heads !

1.0.1

  • find open-source auto extract keywords and extend class to use unicode languages like Farsi

1.1.0

  • previous class integration without any interface,it’s just working !

1.2.0

  • make a little lips for this kid and he just start talking with his interface

1.2.9

  • a lot of enhancement on UI , add new buttons for administration

2.0.0

  • auto-tagging post based on post category with pre-defined tags for categories

2.0.1

  • add multi-language interface based on WP_LANG with .po translation (Easy-to-use)
